narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Independent Community Care Services is a Home Health provider based in Farmington Hills, MI. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $67.6M in Medicaid payments across 361K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $67.6M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
